function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete quantification of viral titers due to lack of investigation on recovery rates for each step in the process.","Impact":"Inaccurate viral titer quantification could lead to incorrect assessments of contamination levels and disease risk.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough investigation of recovery rates for each step in the process and use appropriate reference standards for quantification.","Technologies":"Quantitative PCR methods for accurate viral titer quantification, standardization of experimental procedures.","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials.","Owner":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Variations in PMMoV concentrations across samples without understanding the stability over time for the catchment population.","Impact":"Uncertainty in the stability of PMMoV loading over time could lead to incorrect interpretations of contamination levels.","Mitigation":"Conduct studies with more wastewater samples over a longer period to understand the stability of PMMoV loading for the catchment population.","Technologies":"Longitudinal monitoring, statistical analysis of seasonal variations, wastewater surveillance methods.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, wastewater management authorities.","Owner":"Researchers, public health agencies, wastewater management authorities."}]}
